scripts.build: start /B cmd /c "cd server && pnpm run build" && start /B cmd /c "cd client && pnpm run build"
scripts.dev: start /B cmd /c "cd server && pnpm run dev" && start /B cmd /c "cd client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.install: if-env TYPE=server && (cd server && pnpm install) || (cd client && pnpm install)
